meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>dance</kanji> <kanji>machine</kanji> isn't really a machine... a 台 is a large machine thing counter, so in this case it's talking about a stage. A dancing stage is a <vocabulary>stage</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Just remember that 台 is read as たい here, not だい.
